title: Trump Official Backs Russia’s Return to Global Sports
summary_full: Paolo Zampolli, a special envoy for President Trump, endorsed Russia’s participation at next month’s Paralympics, a move greeted with dismay in European capitals.
summary_public: Paolo Zampolli, a special envoy for President Trump, endorsed Russia’s participation at next month’s Paralympics, a move greeted with dismay in European capitals.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: greeted with dismay in European capitals
